DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study High Dose Liposomal Amphotericin B Efficacy Initial Zygomycosis Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : Efficacy 4 week liposomal amphotericin B ( AmBisome® ) high dose [ 10 mg/kg/j ] maximal tolerable dose initial zygomycosis treatment . Evaluation 4 week treatment end treatment occur . Efficacy define objective response ; complete partial response . Secondary objective : Efficacy , tolerance survival 15 day treatment , cumulative dose AmBisome® necessary obtain objective response , efficacy operate non operated patient , tolerance 4 12 week treatment , survival , relapse rate 6 month 4 week liposomal amphotericin B ( AmBisome® ) high dose [ 10 mg/kg/j ] maximal tolerable dose . Scheme : prospective , multicentric , non comparative therapeutic pilot study . Inclusion criterion : Presence tissue biopsy large non septated hypha compatible zygomycete presence zygomycete culture associate clinical radiological abnormality compatible fungal invasive infection . Exclusion criterion : Life expectancy 72 hour , pregnancy , breast feeding , polyene hypersensitivity , absence histologic mycologic zygomycosis documentation , absence inform consent , previous treatment polyene antifungal active zygomycete ( posaconazole , itraconazole ) 5 day month previous inclusion . Treatment : AmBisome® 10 mg/kg/j monotherapy least 15 day , AmBisome® maximal tolerable dose 15 day associate early optimal surgical treatment . After first treatment month , follow treatment decide referent physician .
